it.polimi.ingsw.GC_32.Client.Game

Class ClientFamilyMember

  • java.lang.Object
    • it.polimi.ingsw.GC_32.Client.Game.ClientFamilyMember

  • public class ClientFamilyMember
extends java.lang.Object
    this class is the client-side representation of the server-side concept of FamilyMember. Because client only show information on the screen, the information contained into this class (like all the classes of the client-side game model) is really less then the server-side equivalent class.
    • actionValue: the action value of this family member
    • owner: the player who own this family member
    • busy: flag which tells if the pawn is busy or not
    See Also:
    ClientActionSpace
